name: FlightsUnite
tag_list: social-buying, travel, group-travel, group-buying, discount-travel, cheap-travel
overview:
FlightsUnite is a website that unites travelers from all over the world into groups per destination and uses the power in numbers theory to negotiate the group the best possible rates for accomodations, car rental, entertainment, food, golf, attractions, and more at the destination city.

No matter where a FlightsUnite user wants to travel to, they can see if others also have the same desire. This is because any user can start their own destination group on FlightsUnite and the company will find great discounts for all members of the group.

The concept of the site is simple. The company is hoping to empower people to have more control of the purchasing market by using the internet’s social media outlets to unite travelers to lower costs. This site is designed for the individual traveler who now has a chance to get discounts normally only offered to corporations and convention planners.

Millions of people visit Disney World in Orlando each year, or golf in Myrtle Beach, or visit Times Square in New York City. FlightsUnite wants a few thousand of those millions to unite at FlightsUnite. Think of the power those thousands travelers now have in dictating a hotel rate. Then think of the discounts and promotions a group of that size can expect from area attractions, restaurants, golf courses, etc.

FlightsUnite is what a social buying network can and will be in the future.

products.name: Group Travel Bookings, Group Attraction Bookings, Group Restaurant Sales, Group Golf Booking
